recipeIntros.text:
Hey Foodies,
If you want to impress friends and family but you are not quite a baker, then this is the right recipe for you. Learn how to prepare this easy Mug Cake recipe and bake them like a pro. All you need to do is mix together flour, milk, cream and sugar, all in just one cup and then let the magic happen in the microwave. And Voila…There you have it a perfect, super soft and rich eggless cake. Try this full proof recipe and you’ll never go wrong.

title: 2 Min Mug Cake Recipe – Super Soft & Rich Eggless Microwave Cakes – CookingShooking
recipeNotes:
Notes:
If you do not have condensed milk then please use a total of 3 tbsp of powdered sugar.
Using oil instead of butter will make the cake extra, moist.
If you do not have condensed milk then you have to increase the cream quantity to 1 ½ tbsp of cream or malai.

Tips:
Cooking time depends totally on the microwave that you are using, the microwave that is used in the video is 800W.

steps.text: In a coffee mug, using a measuring spoon combine, maida, powdered sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder and baking soda. Using a fork give it a good mix.
Pour condensed milk, milk, butter, cream, vinegar and vanilla essence. Using a fork mix everything until well combined and you have a lump free batter.
Once the batter is ready then add 1 tbsp of the extra milk, give it a good stir. You should not add the extra milk earlier, as it would make lumps in the batter.
The mug cake batter is ready; you can add some choco chips or chocolate at this stage before baking it.
Place the mug in the microwave, and cook it for 1 minute, cooking time depends on the microwave that you use.
After 1 minute our Chocolate Mug cake is ready.
In a coffee mug, using a measuring spoon combine, maida, powdered sugar, baking powder and baking soda. Using a fork give it a good mix.
Pour condensed milk, milk, butter, cream, vinegar and vanilla essence. Using a fork mix everything until well combined and you have a lump free batter.
Once the batter is ready then add 1 tbsp of the extra milk, give it a good stir. You should not add the extra milk earlier, as it would make lumps in the batter.
Place the mug in the microwave, and cook it for 1 minute, cooking time depends on the microwave that you use.
After 1 minute our Vanilla Mug cake is ready.
Spongy and soft delicious Mug Cakes are ready to be served.
Sprinkle some toppings such as coloured sprinkles or even a scoop of ice cream and serve.

author: Yaman Agarwal
